{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3544118,"name":"Akın","username":"Akin","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/akin/{size}/252833_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-01T11:28:03.352Z","cooked":"

Hello, we currently have Limelight 3, but we have not had any experience with this camera before. We want to use LiemlightOS (not PhotonVision) for Apriltag tracking. How can we do this? Can you provide an apriltag tracking code example that works with LimelightOS? And do I need to do anything additional to use this in YAGSL?

docs.limelightvision.io

Localization with MegaTag | Limelight Documentation

1. Ensure a field map is uploaded to your Limelight.

There’s sample code on the limelight documentation. The limelight puts data onto network tables and you would just read the data from there.

Here’s the repo for sample code: GitHub - LimelightVision/limelight-examples

Unfortunately, the docs don’t have sample code for python. Are you guys using Java or Python?
